sections.heading: Felony; speedy preliminary hearing required
sections.text: When the complaint is for a felony, upon the accused being brought before the magistrate, he shall proceed as soon as may be, in the presence of the accused, to inquire into the complaint.SourceG.S.1873, c. 58, ยง 300, p. 793;R.S.1913, ยง 8955;C.S.1922, ยง 99
